metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for the fan in the crowd at Dribbles' show.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. Go through the circus and to the right - trigger the Dribbles fight (1,1,1,1 the scene). You can speak to this chatacter after.

0.speaker: Quinton
0.text: I can't believe Dribbles did this - the Dribbles.

1.speaker: Quinton
1.text: I've seen Dribbles' show so many times. He's always so happy, and so funny! Was it all a big fat lie?
1.context: NodeContext: upset, feeling personally betrayed (dribbles attacked the crowd)
